name: Game of The Gods Volume 1: A New Beginning
name_original: Game of The Gods Volume 1: A New Beginning
description:
Play through the exciting tales of people in the era of Ancient Greek. Humans will do whatever it takes to reach for the throne. All while using power of the gods as tool to vanquish their enemies. Yet the gods themselves are not prefect. They will bicker and fight . Skilfully manipulating them will get you the most power living beings on your side will guarantee the power you seek.

Notice: This game contains Renaissance painting "The School of Athens". .

Rated: 13+

For: Language and Paintings of Renaissance

You can also download the Light Novel Here:

https://redd.it/4xccga
